name: Carnival Adventure (mrbo)
description:
The Great Manchild is on his quest for enlightenment.

A mysterious figure, the Carnival Master, promises our hero the solution to his big problem. Collect the seven spheres of enlightenment and discover your true self, more or less...

Carnival Adventure is a first-person shooter with procedurally generated levels, made for 7dfps-2021 and PROCJAM 2021.

CONTROLS:

- WASD: move.

- SPACE: jump. When you touch a wall while jumping, a white bar will appear at the bottom of the screen: if you press jump again before the bar runs out, you can perform an extra jump. This mechanic is essential to reach the most hidden places in the game.

- LEFT MOUSE CLICK: shoot.

- R: generate a new level. The algorithm for level generation isn't perfect. If a level is impossible, press R to generate a new (hopefully better) one.

- ESC: options. Modify FOV and mouse sensitivity.

- ENTER: mouse lock/unlock.

- Y,N: yes or no. When you die, you are asked to continue (Y) or to quit the game (N).

- Alt + F4: quit the game. The game closes itself when it is over too.
